languages.text: "Однако почтенный Предок сберег Его весть и укрылся на этом корабле от охоты ложноверцев. Когда ложный Лорд-капитан, владевший кораблем, принял наших праотцов на борт, Предок услышал их боль и откликнулся, спас, даровав генетическую чистоту. С тех пор он защищал нас, объединял наши мысли в единую песнь. Он был истинным Лорд-капитаном этого корабля".

"And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."
languages.original_text: "Однако почтенный Предок сберег Его весть и укрылся на этом корабле от охоты ложноверцев. Когда ложный Лорд-капитан, владевший кораблем, принял наших праотцов на борт, Предок услышал их боль и откликнулся, спас, даровав генетическую чистоту. С тех пор он защищал нас, объединял наши мысли в единую песнь. Он был истинным Лорд-капитаном этого корабля".

traits.locale_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us ever since, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"But the venerable Ancestor kept His message safe and took refuge from the persecution of false believers aboard this vessel. When the heretical Theodora gave shelter to our forefathers, he heard their pain and responded, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us ever since, joining our thoughts into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"But the venerable Ancestor kept His message safe and took refuge from the persecution of false believers aboard this vessel. When the heretical Theodora gave shelter to our forefathers, he heard their pain and responded, blessing them with genetic purity. He has protected us ever since, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us ever since, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

"And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

languages.text: «No obstante, nuestro venerable Señor mantuvo Su mensaje a salvo y se refugió de la persecución de los herejes a bordo de esta nave. Cuando la falsa Lord Capitán acogió a nuestros ancestros, nuestro Señor escuchó su dolor y respondió a sus plegarias, bendiciéndolos con la pureza genética. Nos protegió desde ese momento, uniendo nuestros pensamientos en una sola canción. Él era el verdadero Lord Capitán de esta nave».
languages.original_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, nuestro venerable Señor mantuvo Su mensaje a salvo y se refugió de la persecución de los herejes a bordo de esta nave. Cuando la falsa Lord Capitán acogió a nuestros ancestros, nuestro Señor escuchó su dolor y respondió a sus plegarias, bendiciéndolos con la pureza genética. Nos protegió desde ese momento, uniendo nuestros pensamientos en una sola canción. Él era el verdadero Lord Capitán de esta nave».

«Pero nuestro venerable Señor mantuvo Su mensaje a salvo y se refugió de la persecución de los falsos creyentes a bordo de esta nave. Cuando la hereje Theodora acogió a nuestros ancestros, Él escuchó su dolor y respondió, bendiciéndolos con la pureza genética. Nos protege desde entonces, uniendo nuestros pensamientos en una sola canción. Él era el verdadero Lord Capitán de esta nave».

languages.text: 「ですが、偉大なるサイアは主のメッセージを安全な場所に保管し、異端者による迫害から逃れるべく、本艦に乗船されました。偽のロード・キャプテンが私たちの先祖を船に乗せた時、サイアは願いを聞き、それに応え、遺伝的な純潔を祝福したのです。それ以来、かの方は我らを守り、我らの思いをひとつの歌にしてくださいました。彼はこの船の真なるロード・キャプテンでありました」
languages.original_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「ですが、偉大なるサイアは主のメッセージを安全な場所に保管し、異端者による迫害から逃れるべく、本艦に乗船されました。偽のロード・キャプテンが私たちの先祖を船に乗せた時、サイアは願いを聞き、それに応え、遺伝的な純潔を祝福したのです。それ以来、かの方は我らを守り、我らの思いをひとつの歌にしてくださいました。彼はこの船の真なるロード・キャプテンでありました」
「ですが、偉大なるサイアは自身のメッセージを安全な場所に保管し、偽りの信者による迫害から逃れるべく、本艦に乗船されました。異端者シオドーラが我らの父祖に庇護を与えた際、彼は父祖らの苦痛を聞き、それに応え、遺伝的なピュリティの祝福を与えられたのです。それ以来、かの方は我らを守り、我らの思いをひとつの歌にしてくださいました。彼はこの船の真なるロード・キャプテンでありました」

languages.text: “但伟大的族长守护住了祂的福音，在这艘船上避难，躲避那些异端分子的迫害。当那位虚假的领主舰长让我们的祖先上船时，族长听到了那些人的苦难，回应了他们的祈祷，赐予了他们纯洁的基因。自那之后，他一直都在守护我们，将我们所有人的思想融入同一首歌谣之中。他才是这艘船真正的领主舰长。”
languages.original_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

traits.locale_text: “但伟大的族长守护住了祂的福音，在这艘船上避难，躲避那些异端分子的迫害。当那位虚假的领主舰长让我们的祖先上船时，族长听到了那些人的苦难，回应了他们的祈祷，赐予了他们纯洁的基因。自那之后，他一直都在守护我们，将我们所有人的思想融入同一首歌谣之中。他才是这艘船真正的领主舰长。”
“但伟大的祖父守护住了祂的福音，躲过了那些虚伪信徒的迫害。当那个异端分子西奥多拉为我们的祖先提供庇护时，他听到了那些人的痛苦，做出了回应，用纯洁的基因祝福他们。自那之后，他一直都在守护我们，将我们所有人的思想融入同一首歌谣之中。他才是这艘船真正的领主舰长。”

languages.text: "Und doch verwahrte der ehrenwerte Schöpfer Seine Botschaft sicher und floh auf dieses Schiff, weit weg von der Verfolgung durch Ketzer. Als dieser falsche Lord Captain unsere Vorfahren an Bord aufnahm, erhörte der Schöpfer ihr Leid und segnete sie mit genetischer Reinheit. Fortan beschützte er uns und vereinte unsere Gedanken zu einem einzigen Lied. Er war der wahre Lord Captain dieses Schiffs."
languages.original_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Und doch verwahrte der ehrenwerte Schöpfer Seine Botschaft sicher und floh auf dieses Schiff, weit weg von der Verfolgung durch Ketzer. Als dieser falsche Lord Captain unsere Vorfahren an Bord aufnahm, erhörte der Schöpfer ihr Leid und segnete sie mit genetischer Reinheit. Fortan beschützte er uns und vereinte unsere Gedanken zu einem einzigen Lied. Er war der wahre Lord Captain dieses Schiffs."

"Aber der ehrwürdige Schöpfer bewahrte Seine Botschaft sicher und floh vor der Verfolgung durch falsche Gläubige an Bord dieses Schiffes. Als die Ketzerin Theodora unseren Ahnen Zuflucht gewährte, hörte er ihren Schmerz und segnete sie mit genetischer Reinheit. Seitdem beschützt er uns und verbindet unsere Gedanken zu einem einzigen Lied. Er war der wahre Lord Captain dieses Schiffs."

languages.text: « Malgré tout, l'honorable Sire a gardé Son message en sécurité et s'est réfugié sur ce vaisseau pour échapper à la persécution des hérétiques. Quand ce faux seigneur-capitaine a accueilli nos ancêtres à son bord, le Sire a entendu leur souffrance et a répondu à leurs prières en leur offrant la bénédiction de la pureté génétique. Il nous a protégés et a uni nos pensées en un seul et unique chant. Il était le véritable seigneur-capitaine de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "And yet the venerable Sire kept His message safe and took refuge on this vessel, away from the persecution of heretics. When that false Lord Captain let our ancestors on board, the Sire heard their pain and answered their pleas, blessing them with genetic purity. He protected us after that, joining our thoughts together into a single song. He was the true Lord Captain of this ship."

traits.locale_text: « Malgré tout, l'honorable Sire a gardé Son message en sécurité et s'est réfugié sur ce vaisseau pour échapper à la persécution des hérétiques. Quand ce faux seigneur-capitaine a accueilli nos ancêtres à son bord, le Sire a entendu leur souffrance et a répondu à leurs prières en leur offrant la bénédiction de la pureté génétique. Il nous a protégés et a uni nos pensées en un seul et unique chant. Il était le véritable seigneur-capitaine de ce vaisseau. »

« Mais l'honorable Sire a gardé Son message en sécurité et s'est réfugié à bord de ce vaisseau pour échapper à la persécution des faux croyants. Quand l'hérétique Théodora a recueilli nos ancêtres, il a entendu leur souffrance et leur a offert la bénédiction de la pureté génétique. Il nous a protégés et a uni nos pensées en un seul et unique chant. Il était le véritable seigneur-capitaine de ce vaisseau. »
